document.full_text: duke point guard kyrie irving has been out since dec. 4 due to a right foot injury, but looks on track for a return in the n.c.a.a. tournament.
document.title: irving's return complicates duke's plans
lines_and_colors: duke point guard kyrie irving has been out since dec. 4 due to a right foot injury, but looks on track for a return in the n.c.a.a. tournament.
